short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure quantity six (6)  Troop Carrier Vehicle 4X2 for delivery to USS St-Jean, Quebec, within 270 days after receipt of order
description: The Troop Carrier Vehicle 4X2 is to be delivered to USS St-Jean, Quebec. With no security requirement associated with this procurement. Documents can be submitted in either of the two official languages of Canada.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Richardson No. PW-22-01010248

**Contract Title:** Troop Carrier Vehicle 4x2 Configuration

**Government Agency:** Department of National Defence

**Request Type:** Invitation to Submit Proposal (RFP)

**Competition Type:** Open Bidding

**Trade Agreements:** Eligibility to respond to this contract is open to Parties in Canada and other signatory Countries to specified Trade Agreements as per the Canada Trade Compendium.

**Key Dates:**

*   **Publication Date:** October 17, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 29, 2022, 2:00:00 PM
*   **Amendment Date:** November 24, 2022

**Contract Details:**

The Department of National Defence is soliciting Proposals with quantities six (6) Troop Carrier Vehicle 3T 4X2 configuration for delivery to USS St. Jean, Quebec. Estimated duration of contract is 270 days after receipt of order.

**Issued Documents:**

[List attachments in documents]
